short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension designed to make endorsing your friend's skills a breeze!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use Endorsify to make endorsing your connection's skills much faster! 

How to use: 
Navigate to your friends page at url:/in/friendName
Click show all skills 
Click on endorsify! in your extensions tab and click the endorse button! 

For even faster endorsing make sure and pin the extension to your browser!
